structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 9, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 283, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 45, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 5, effective January 1, 1977.

metadata.note: 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 48 would have amended this section effective July 1, 1982. However, 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396 was repealed by 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, also effective July 1, 1982.
